titleStmt.title: The doleful dance, and song of death; intituled, Dance after my pipe. To a pleasant new tune.
titleStmt.author: Hill, Thomas, fl. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: for F. Coles, T. Vere, I. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passenger,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Can you dance the shaking of the sheets ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
